none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-04-no-mans-slave/extracted/No Man's Slave - Ear Damage/01 Getting What We Deserve
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-04-no-mans-slave/extracted/No Man's Slave - Ear Damage/02 Unamerican Hardcore

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 04, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 These two songs are on the NO MAN'S SLAVE collection tape that slipped by at the close of the decade before the last one, but when I saw they were credited to the Ear Damage cassette I just assumed that was an inside joke because I had all the NO MAN'S SLAVE shit. Ross proved me wrong last week with a box of heat from my old stomping grounds. Sixty-eight seconds of sound on a Maxell UR60? Seems like a perfectly logical use of time and resources to me. Shit...this band was fukkn good. EAR DAMAGE
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-H2u257ByHOg/YF4hbYsi7JI/AAAAAAAAZGk/fii1TGUiXPE6mf2g9zW2gDUfrxeXK5pjQCLcBGAsYHQ/s785/NMS%2Bcover.jpg
